name: JIGGLE WATTS -JELLY MATCH GAME
description:
Find out why EVERYONE is playing Jiggle Watts, a simple yet addictive FREE matching puzzle game

with a refreshing new twist. Connect the matching Jiggle Watts as they fall from the sky. Match three or

more to trigger explosive chain reactions and earn supercharged power-ups, just watch out for the evil

S’morasaurus!


Jiggle Watts is perfect for 60-second bursts of fun and can also be enjoyed at your own pace in our

‘Endless Play Mode’. The choice is yours!

Featuring over 90 action-packed levels, you’ll absolutely LOVE this perfect blend of ‘easy to play, difficult

to master’ gameplay.


*JIGGLE WATTS REVIEWS*

5/5  “This. Is. So. Freaking. Adorable. It makes me smile constantly! LOVE THIS GAME!

5/5 “Totally worth downloading - This is by far that perfect game you are searching for”

5/5 “Cute hybrid of Tetris and Match-3. The controls are simple to control.”

5/5  “Wow. Best game. Love the jellies. Should be the #1 game in the App Store”

5/5 “Two thumbs up. I think I've found the perfect game that keeps my attention, it's addictive”

Ready yourself for a brilliant new puzzle adventure - the adorable Jiggle Watts need your help so

download for your mobile device and play for FREE now!


* WHY YOU’LL LOVE JIGGLE WATTS *

-An intuitive & fun ‘twist’ on your favourite Match 3 and ‘falling blocks’ puzzle games.

-A wild “Jiggle adventure” featuring over 90 engaging levels.

-Unlock an ‘Endless Play Mode’ called Jelly World, featuring unique gameplay, challenges and rewards!

-Unleash pyrotechnic game-changing Boosts and Power Ups.

-Super-handy ‘Friend Assist’ feature’ lets your friends join in to beat tricky levels.

-Challenge your friends and demolish their high scores.

A charming arcade matching puzzle game!  Play FREE now and rescue the Jiggle Watts before the

S’morasaurus gets them all!


PLEASE NOTE: Jiggle Watts is a completely free to play puzzle game, with optional in-game items and

boosts available to purchase for real money.

Having technical questions or suggestions? Our game team would LOVE to hear from you! You can

reach us at gamesupport@kizstudios.com

Important Message for Parents

This game may include:

- Live links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.

- Live links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web

page.

- Advertising of Kiz Studios products as well as products from select partners.

- For optional in-game purchases, the bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
